org.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

managers.description: The logins of the users to set as the campaign managers. At this time, only a single manager can be supplied.

team_managers.description: The slugs of the teams to set as the campaign managers.

ends_at.description: The end date and time of the campaign, in ISO 8601 format':' YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.

contact_link.description: The contact link of the campaign. Must be a URI.

state.title: Campaign state
state.description: Indicates whether a campaign is open or closed
